column4: i miss the ping that windows makes when you adjust the sound volume... =)
it avoids you blowing your eardrums out if you have headphones...
is it possible to mount smb shares on boot?
because of what I just described
what are you trying to get help for?
I'd advise against it right now
it's surprising that ubuntu-desktop was made to depend on it already.  It appears to have not been tested.
yes, but you reinstall esound.  It'll remove polypaudio and ubuntu-desktop, but that's not too critical
it's just a meta-package that depends on a lot of other packages.
but removing it doesn't remove all those things
yes, but linux-image-686 doesn't depend on it yet because of what randabis is saying
